title: Godzilla
description: The King of the Monsters, a gigantic creature that emerges from the ocean to sow chaos.
large_description: Godzilla is a gigantic prehistoric creature awakened by nuclear radiation. Known for its incredible strength and ability to unleash an atomic breath, Godzilla has been both a destroyer and a savior of humanity on various occasions.

title: Dr√°cula
description: The famous vampire who feeds on the blood of the living and can transform into a bat.
large_description: Dracula, also known as Count Dracula, is a legendary vampire who resides in a castle in Transylvania. With supernatural abilities such as immortality and the power to transform, Dracula is one of the most iconic characters in the horror genre.

title: Frankenstein
description: A creature made from parts of corpses, created by the scientist Victor Frankenstein.
large_description: Frankenstein, also known as Frankenstein's Monster, is the result of an experiment by Dr. Victor Frankenstein. Although initially seeking understanding and acceptance, his appearance and origin lead him to be rejected and feared by humanity.
